content.question: The architects of the Hagia Sophia created an expansive internal space by using

choices.label: groin vaults to channel the weight of the dome
an oculus to let in natural light
pendentives to support the central dome
a ring of radiating chapels to widen the interior

content.answer: pendentives to support the central dome
